title: Can't post or comment because it says I'm level 1.
body:
Maybe this thread will fix it?

Edit: It did. 

Good, but it kinda sucks that I had to make a whole new thread so boards updates the level. I waited for 2 weeks after registering in boards so time wasn't the issue.

replies.body: Glad to hear it's working for you now!  Sometimes your profile needs to sync up, though, this [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)can help move things along too.
